Not really. I'm gay.
-[Sheila] I think… -Hello, Mum.

-You all right? -Yeah. Good.
Just talking about poor Renate.
Such a lovely woman.
Divorce can be so painful.
-Yeah. -[Sheila] Anyway, celebration is in order.

get the money arranged. Can't risk losing this one.

What do you want to go there for?

translation.it: si parla di te, dell'alcol e della droga...

translation.en: you're breaking your poor mum's heart.

translation.en: Tell you what, I'll write you a check. Hmm?
So she can go buy a new one.
translation.it: Così se ne compra un altro.

translation.en: Typical that you'd say something like that about me,
translation.it: Devi sempre dire queste cose di me.

translation.en: when I've given up so much for you.
translation.it: Dopo tutto ciò che ho sacrificato per te.

translation.en: What have you given up for me?
Your father… for a start.
You really are a heartless monster.
translation.it: Sei veramente un mostro senza cuore.

translation.en: You know, I don't live my life in black and white.
translation.it: Sai, io non vivo la mia vita in bianco e nero.

translation.en: And I do not want your fucked-up, frigid ideas about anything.
translation.it: E non mi interessa la tua visione frigida e distorta dell'esistenza.

translation.en: [clears throat] You know, I am so sick of running away from who I am.
translation.it: Sono stufo di scappare da chi sono davvero.

translation.en: [exhales] There's nothing wrong with success. Or pleasure.
translation.it: Non c'è nulla di male nel successo o nel piacere.

translation.en: In fact, why am I apologizing for it?
Mum, I have fucked everything that moves.
And I've taken every drug known to man.
translation.it: E ho preso qualsiasi droga esista sul pianeta.

translation.en: All of them.
Do you know what?
I enjoyed every last minute of it.
translation.it: Me la sono goduta fino all'ultimo.

translation.en: Ever since you first dangled your fat little legs
translation.it: Da quando hai posato le gambe grassocce

translation.en: in front of a piano, you've been lucky.
translation.it: davanti al piano, hai avuto fortuna.

translation.en: You've never worked hard for a bloody thing in your life.
translation.it: Non ti sei mai dovuto sudare un accidente, nella vita.

translation.en: It all just comes to you. You don't do anything.
translation.it: Ottieni tutto, senza dover fare niente.

translation.en: And I'm the one who suffers.
translation.it: E a soffrire sono solo io.

translation.en: I should never have had children.
translation.it: Non avrei mai dovuto avere figli.

translation.en: Do you know how disappointing it is to be your mother?

If you don't care about yourself, how do you expect anyone else to?

translation.en: -you weren't there. -It's not weak to ask for help.

translation.en: And now it's me that can't walk down the streets.

translation.en: [Elton] For as long as I can remember, I've hated myself.
translation.it: Da che ho memoria, ho sempre detestato me stesso.

translation.en: Yeah, but I started acting like a cunt in 1975.

translation.en: I just forgot to stop.
I do feel ashamed.
Spent so long feeling resentful for things that just don't matter.

You was never ordinary.
[Sheila] Look at you.

translation.it: Seduto qui, a parlare dei tuoi sentimenti.

translation.en: What a waste of time.
Mum, I know it was never easy.
translation.it: Mamma, lo so che non è mai stato facile.

translation.en: And I hope you can forgive me.
translation.it: E spero che tu possa perdonarmi.

translation.en: Because I've realized that's what we need to do now.
translation.it: Perché ho capito che è ciò che dobbiamo fare, adesso.

translation.en: Forgive each other.
-No, your problem is you're selfish. -[Elton] No.
translation.it: - Il tuo problema è che sei un egoista. - No.

translation.en: My problem was I believed you loved me.
translation.it: Il mio problema è che ho creduto che mi amassi.

translation.en: And you're incapable of it.
I gave everything to keep something that I never even had in the first place.
translation.it: Ho dato tutto per tenere qualcosa che non è mai stato mio.

translation.en: I always thought you was an introverted extrovert.

Bernie.

translation.en: No, no, no, I love you, man.
Always have, always will.

translation.en: And that's what's important.
You just need to remember who you are…

Good to see you.
Some days are tougher than others, but I feel good.

-No. -No?

What if I'm not as good…

translation.en: without the drink and the drugs?
You know that's not true.

translation.en: You're not scared you're not good without it,
translation.it: Non hai paura di non valere niente,

translation.en: you're scared to feel again.
You might be able to lie to yourself, but you can't lie to me.
translation.it: Sarai bravo a mentire a te stesso, ma non a me.

translation.en: I should be going. [pats leg]
Don't go.
Not yet.
This is the part you gotta do on your own.
translation.it: Questa è la parte che devi fare da solo.

Thank you, Bernie.
You're my brother.
